Iron-Hewed Smash.name: Iron-Hewed Smash
Iron-Hewed Smash.flavor: You imbue your weapon with your own fury, striking hard to send your foes flying.
Iron-Hewed Smash.target: Each enemy you can see in the blast
Iron-Hewed Smash.onHit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target 5 squares.

Overwhelming Force.name: Overwhelming Force
Overwhelming Force.flavor: You channel the inherent violence of the world into a blow that freezes a foe in its tracks.
Overwhelming Force.onHit: 4[W] + Constitution modifier force damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Enduring Body.name: Enduring Body
Enduring Body.flavor: As combat takes its toll on you, the power of your mind protects your ody from additional harm.
Enduring Body.effect: Until the end of the encounter, while you are bloodied you have regeneration 5 and resist 5 to all damage.
